events.name: Advent Season Begins
events.description: The beginning of the liturgical year and the season of preparation for Christmas.

events.name: Christmas Day
events.description: Celebration of the birth of Jesus Christ.

events.name: Epiphany
events.description: Celebration of God's manifestation to the Gentiles through the visit of the Magi.

events.name: Ash Wednesday
events.description: The beginning of Lent, a 40-day period of fasting and repentance.

events.name: Palm Sunday
events.description: Commemoration of Jesus's triumphant entry into Jerusalem.

events.name: Maundy Thursday
events.description: Commemoration of the Last Supper and Jesus washing the disciples' feet.

events.name: Good Friday
events.description: Remembrance of Jesus's crucifixion and death.

events.name: Easter Sunday
events.description: Celebration of the resurrection of Jesus Christ.

events.name: Pentecost
events.description: Commemoration of the Holy Spirit's descent upon the disciples.

events.name: Trinity Sunday
events.description: Celebration of the doctrine of the Holy Trinity.

events.name: All Saints' Day
events.description: Commemoration of all saints and martyrs.
